author: Leigh Kamping-Carder
title: Intoxicating Hidden Bars for the Home
text:
Is there anything more suave than pressing a button to open the doors of a secret room off your library? Only when that room is a hidden bar, stacked with shelves of glittering glassware and bottles.
A hidden bar is a whiz-bang addition to a home. Durable materials such as stone countertops are a safe and stylish bet. A tinted mirror for the back wall is a popular option and makes the space look bigger. As for shelving, glass is a typical choice that is easy to clean. Materials will affect costs, which can easily stretch...
